iPhone 15 Pro.subject: Meet the Future: iPhone 15 Pro is Here!
iPhone 15 Pro.preview: Experience the future of technology with the iPhone 15 Pro. Get a sneak peek now!
iPhone 15 Pro.prompt: Generate a catchy introduction email for the iPhone 15 Pro to encourage window shoppers to make a purchase
iPhone 15 Pro.emailContent: Dear Tech Enthusiast, get ready to step into the future with our brand new iPhone 15 Pro. Packed with cutting-edge features, this is not just a phone, it's a revolution. Don't wait, grab yours now!
iPhone 15 Pro.imagePrompt: Generate an image of a sleek iPhone 15 Pro against a futuristic background

iPhone 15 Pro.subject: Still Considering the iPhone 15 Pro? We Saved It For You!
iPhone 15 Pro.preview: Your future iPhone 15 Pro is waiting in your cart. Don't let it slip away!
iPhone 15 Pro.prompt: Generate a follow-up email for customers who abandoned their cart with the iPhone 15 Pro, encouraging them to complete their purchase
iPhone 15 Pro.emailContent: Hi there, we noticed you left an iPhone 15 Pro in your cart. Don't let the future wait, complete your purchase now. Remember, the future is now!
iPhone 15 Pro.imagePrompt: Generate an image of a shopping cart with an iPhone 15 Pro peeking out

iPhone 15 Pro.subject: Exclusive: Special Offer on Your New iPhone 15 Pro
iPhone 15 Pro.preview: As our valued customer, we have an exclusive offer just for you on the iPhone 15 Pro!
iPhone 15 Pro.prompt: Generate an email offering a special discount on the iPhone 15 Pro for high converting customers
iPhone 15 Pro.emailContent: Dear Valued Customer, as a token of appreciation for your loyalty, we are offering an exclusive discount on the iPhone 15 Pro. Grab this offer now and step into the future with us!
iPhone 15 Pro.imagePrompt: Generate an image of the iPhone 15 Pro with a special discount badge

Samsung Galaxy S24.subject: Meet the Future with Samsung Galaxy S24
Samsung Galaxy S24.preview: Unearth the potentials of Samsung's latest tech marvel.
Samsung Galaxy S24.prompt: Introduce Samsung Galaxy S24 to the audience
Samsung Galaxy S24.emailContent:
Hello Tech Enthusiast, 

Step into the future with Samsung Galaxy S24. Experience the cutting-edge technology and state-of-the-art features, all designed to elevate your mobile experience to the next level. Don't just get ahead, stay ahead with Samsung Galaxy S24. 

Best, 
Your Samsung Team
Samsung Galaxy S24.imagePrompt: A futuristic image of Samsung Galaxy S24 with a sleek design.

Samsung Galaxy S24.subject: Don't Miss Out on Samsung Galaxy S24
Samsung Galaxy S24.preview: Your future device is still waiting in your cart.
Samsung Galaxy S24.prompt: Remind audience about Samsung Galaxy S24 in their cart
Samsung Galaxy S24.emailContent:
Hi there, 

It seems you've left something incredible in your cart. The Samsung Galaxy S24, our most powerful and advanced smartphone yet, is waiting for you. Don't let the future wait. Grab your Galaxy S24 now! 

Cheers, 
Your Samsung Team
Samsung Galaxy S24.imagePrompt: A cart with a Samsung Galaxy S24 sticking out.

Samsung Galaxy S24.subject: Exclusive Offer Just For You - Samsung Galaxy S24
Samsung Galaxy S24.preview: An opportunity to seize the future exclusively designed for you.
Samsung Galaxy S24.prompt: Present an exclusive offer for Samsung Galaxy S24
Samsung Galaxy S24.emailContent:
Hello High Converter, 

As a thank you for being a loyal customer, we're giving you an exclusive opportunity to be one of the first ones to get your hands on the Samsung Galaxy S24. Seize the future and enjoy this exclusive offer. 

Yours, 
Your Samsung Team
Samsung Galaxy S24.imagePrompt: Samsung Galaxy S24 with a 'Premium Offer' tag.

MacBook Pro.subject: Discover the Power of MacBook Pro!
MacBook Pro.preview: Experience the best of technology with MacBook Pro.
MacBook Pro.prompt: Generate an engaging email introducing the MacBook Pro to window shoppers
MacBook Pro.emailContent:
Hello Tech Enthusiast, 

It's time to level up your tech game with the new MacBook Pro. Its sleek design, powerful performance, and innovative features are sure to meet your tech needs. Don't wait, explore the world of MacBook Pro now!
MacBook Pro.imagePrompt: Generate an image of MacBook Pro with exciting features highlighted

MacBook Pro.subject: You're One Step Away from Owning a MacBook Pro!
MacBook Pro.preview: Get back to your cart and complete your MacBook Pro purchase.
MacBook Pro.prompt: Generate an enticing email reminding cart abandoners to complete their MacBook Pro purchase
MacBook Pro.emailContent:
Hey there, 

You left a MacBook Pro in your cart. Don't miss out on experiencing the ultimate tech power. Complete your purchase now and step into the world of endless possibilities with MacBook Pro.
MacBook Pro.imagePrompt: Generate an image of MacBook Pro in a shopping cart

MacBook Pro.subject: Exclusive Offer on MacBook Pro Just for You!
MacBook Pro.preview: Unlock an exclusive deal on MacBook Pro now!
MacBook Pro.prompt: Generate a persuasive email offering an exclusive deal on MacBook Pro to high converters
MacBook Pro.emailContent:
Dear Valued Customer, 

As a token of our appreciation, we're offering you an exclusive deal on MacBook Pro. Grab your MacBook Pro today at a special price and take your tech experience to new heights!
MacBook Pro.imagePrompt: Generate an image of MacBook Pro with a 'Special Offer' tag
